Description:
Fabulous Coastal Resort Living!
A wonderful opportunity for coastal resort style living, located in the "Sails on Beach Street" gated complex and only a short 100 metre stroll to the gorgeous north facing bay beach of Cowes is this beautifully presented spacious double storey townhouse comprising second level master bedroom with built in robes, dual access ensuite/bathroom, generous light filled open plan living, dining and kitchen. Step out through sliding doors on to a lovely balcony perfect to relax and enjoy a home cooked breakfast whilst soaking up the morning sun!
Downstairs you will find two good sized bedrooms with built in robes, with one of the bedrooms opening out to a private paved courtyard, family bathroom including bath and European laundry with ample storage.
Other great features include - quality fixtures and fittings, 8ft ceilings, remote single garage with direct access, two split system heating/cooling units, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, stone bench tops, glass splash backs, water tank
To complete your holiday experience the resort offers shared barbecue facilities and an outdoor in ground solar heated swimming pool perfect for the ideal holiday getaway!
This is a great opportunity to purchase an investment property in a fantastic location and experience everything that Phillip Island has to offer - wonderful shops, restaurants and cafe's, beautiful bay and surf beaches, visit the many attractions and Grand Prix track!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 14/7 Beach Street, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
The Perfect Entertainer
This immaculately presented, modern family home is located in the family friendly Seagrove Estate. Comprising of 4 spacious bedrooms with the master bedroom features an ensuite and walk in robe. There are 2 living areas which predominantly face north ensuring light filled rooms and lower energy costs.
The kitchen has also been designed with entertaining in mind with a large central island bench, stainless steel stove and cooktop, dishwasher, built in microwave, all this and more is adjacent to the sunny dining area overlooking the private rear yard. The main living space flows out to an extensive undercover deck, perfect for outdoor relaxation or alfresco dining. Split system and Gas ducted heating throughout the home will keep you warm on the cold winter days, supported by the Seagrove reticulated gas system. There is a large double, remote garage with internal access and ample storage.
Adjacent to one of Seagrove's many parks.
Set within a 525 sqm (approx.) fully fenced allotment with lovely landscaped, low maintenance surrounds, this property backs on to the access track which leads straight to Cowes beach and Anderson Rd Boat ramp.
Don't miss your opportunity to secure this outstanding home, all withing walking distance from Thompson Avenue - school, shops, cafe's and restaurants, and a 10 minute stroll to the protected north facing Cowes foreshore.
Call today to arrange an inspection as this property will not disappoint.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Shouting For Attention!
Located only a short stroll from the popular Cowes beach front is this double story spacious brick & cedar home. Comprising of four bedrooms and two bathrooms, this large family residence has a great deal of exciting potential.
Offering a grand entertainment room upon entry and a spacious kitchen with a comfortable living room. Formal dining has also been catered for, with a separate dining area with beautifully exposed beams that follow out to a private decking. This home is ideal for those who love to entertain!
Conveniently situated on a generous sized corner allotment of 648sqm (approx), this property is within walking distance to a variety of amenities including schools, shops and the local sporting centre.
Other features include dual access bathroom downstairs, a fire place, large backyard and an undercover private verandah.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
BRAND NEW MODERN HOME
This quality built home has only just recently been completed and is now ready for your family to move in to.
Thoughtfully designed, this home comprises of master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, a further 3 bedrooms, main bathroom with bath and a second living area, which provides a great separate space to keep the kids entertained or even a convenient study area.
The open plan kitchen, dining & living area opens out to a north facing covered deck which is perfect for outdoor entertaining on those warm summer evenings. The well-appointed and spacious kitchen offers stunning stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel gas cook top and electric oven, stainless steel dishwasher and walk-in pantry.
Further features of this lovely property include split system air conditioners, offering year round comfort and a fully landscaped yard which is child & pet friendly.
Call our office today to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
Light filled modern family living!
This extensively renovated, light filled modern family home combines the best of lifestyle and location to appeal to the whole family! Comprising of four spacious bedrooms set over two levels with the huge master bedroom upstairs offering a double walk in wardrobe, two brand new full bathrooms and two separate living areas, designed to perfectly cater for family living. Additional features of this home include three well positioned split system heating and cooling units, floating timber flooring throughout, a sparkling new kitchen with dishwasher and Caesar stone bench tops. Outside has it all with the 600sqm (approx.) block offering the perfect space for the kids and pets to play with full fencing including privacy gates over the driveway, a double lock up garage and ample room for boats and caravans. Located in a fantastic location only a short walk from the centre of Cowes with restaurants and cafes, all amenities, Cowes Primary School and of course the spectacular Cowes foreshore beach and jetty! All the hard work has been done for you, move on in or invest today.

Description:
Spacious three bedroom townhouse in fabulous central Cowes position.
Spacious and light filled in premier location, this three bedroom townhouse offers an opportunity for a low maintenance beach side home or holiday retreat. The large open plan living room opens to a private and sheltered courtyard. The kitchen offers room for the creative cook or the family to prepare meals together and features stone benchtops and up to the minute appliances. A powder room offers a 3rd toilet
The master bedroom suite is located on the ground level and has a walk in robe and en suite.
Upstairs there are two bedrooms with a family bathroom. One bedroom opens to the large enclosed deck, this room could be used as another living area or home office.
Polished timber floors, reverse cycle ducted heating & cooling, quality fittings , a front garden and courtyard with room for boat, caravan or fully fence into another outdoor living area. 300m walk to shops, restaurants & cafe's, 500m stroll to Cowes beach. Double garage with internal access.
A superb investment and a wonderful place to live. Inspection of this quality townhouse will not disappoint.

Description:
Cottage Cutie!
This gorgeous seaside cottage situated in the Red Rocks area of Cowes would make the perfect weekend escape, first home or investment property. Beautifully presented, this neat and tidy home is being offered fully furnished; walk in and start living! The delightful home comprises an open plan kitchen and living area and three bedrooms, one of which is currently furnished as a second living area, a bathroom and separate toilet. The large rear yard includes a fire pit, an undercover entertainment area, trampoline and swing set creating the ideal play ground for all. Additional features include polished timber floors throughout, split system heating and cooling, a covered front verandah and carport. Set on an established, low maintenance allotment of approximately 604 square metres and within walking distance to the stunning Red Rocks beach, this is a great opportunity to purchase in this desirable location.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
.The ideal place for luxury living walk to beach
.Large enough to build your dream home or multiple units (S.T.C.A), this vacant parcel of land is approx. [1029]m2. Located in an ideal position within a charming and peaceful established neighbourhood, the property backs onto a recreation reserve and is literally only two minutes away from the Phillip Island Golf Course.
Whether you are looking for an island escape with weekend drives through the picturesque countryside or a place to build your dream home, you'll find it here. The bustling and undeniably quaint seaside township of Cowes is just approx. a 5 min walk and has something for everyone, including major supermarkets, specialty stores and a wide variety of cafés and restaurants. While a casual stroll across the road, through the lane, you arrive at the quieter Cowes East Beach and Lovers Walk.
Perfect for all ages, the semi-fenced block is located right next to Dunsmore Park where you and your kids can hire a tennis court, dine at the Island Sporting Club Bistro, shoot hoops on the netball court, play football and cricket or walk the dogs on the sports oval. To top it all off, you can even stay healthy and active in the gym or relax and warm up in the therapeutic sauna at the Phillip Island Leisure Centre located at the rear of the park.
With local galleries, conservation and wildlife reserves, renowned fishing hot spots, world-class surf and swimming beaches all amidst the natural beauty of the Victorian countryside, you don't need to wait any longer to be a part of all that Phillip Island has to offer.
Offering
• Located in Cowes, Phillip Island, less than 2 hour's drive from
Melbourne CBD.
• Helipad and airport 15 mins away.
• Near level vacant land of approx. [1029]m2.
• Build your dream home or Multiple units (S.T.C.A).
• Ideal space for your dream family home or weekend escape.
• Close to the beach and Lovers Walk.
• Charming neighbourhood with quality homes and established
gardens.
• Walking distance to the Cowes shops, cafés and restaurants.
• Two minutes from Phillip Island Golf Course and Ten Pin
Bowling & Entertainment Centre.
• A minute or two from the well-equipped Phillip Island Leisure
Centre.
• Close to conservation and wildlife reserves, local galleries
• A short drive to popular wineries, cheese artisans and farm
gates.
• Sheltered swimming beaches, renowned fishing hot spots
and world class surfing.
photos are not actual views - area views
Call Agent to meet on site

Live Now, Develop Later!
Presenting an exciting opportunity to make your own this brilliantly located slice of Phillip Island, with only a short stroll to our lovely north facing beach. Situated on one of the areas best-known streets, this property provides the potential for subdivision (STCA) with a total of 817sqm (approx.) corner block.
The current home comprising spacious lounge/dining, separate kitchen and 2 bedrooms both with B.I.R's. Additional features include split system heating/cooling, a large undercover front deck, spacious laundry, double garage and large fully fenced yard. There is also a bungalow on the property which could be ideal for a teenager retreat or a third bedroom, with separate split system.
Don't miss out, properties like this one don't last long.

Description:
THE ULTIMATE IN LOW MAINTENANCE LIVING
Situated in the popular Shearwater Estate, opposite parkland, you will love the sense of space from the moment you step through the front door of this immaculate home.
Offering 4 bedrooms, the master with walk in robe & ensuite and built in robes to the remaining 3 bedrooms, all of which are generously sized.
Warm & inviting, the kitchen is the hub of this home. A large island bench with room for seating, means that you can pull up a stool and have a lovely chat over a cuppa, or is the perfect informal dining experience. Continuing out from the kitchen are the dining and living areas. Open plan & north facing, these are full of light and warmth on a cold winter's day.
The backyard, which is accessible through sliding doors from the living area, is designed for low maintenance, with it's paved and concreted areas.
Further features include a large garage, split system air conditioning and great storage areas.
This home is a must see. Call our office to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Design your Luxury home or Townhouses minutes to beach
The ideal place for luxury living walk to beach
Large enough to build your dream home or multiple units (S.T.C.A), this vacant parcel of land is approx. [1029]m2. Located in an ideal position within a charming and peaceful established neighbourhood, the property backs onto a recreation reserve and is literally only two minutes away from the Phillip Island Golf Course
Whether you are looking for an island escape with weekend drives through the picturesque countryside or a place to build your dream home, you'll find it here. The bustling and undeniably quaint seaside township of Cowes is just approx. a 5 min walk and has something for everyone, including major supermarkets, specialty stores and a wide variety of cafés and restaurants. While a casual stroll across the road, through the lane, you arrive at the quieter Cowes East Beach and Lovers Walk
Perfect for all ages, the semi-fenced block is located right next to Dunsmore Park where you and your kids can hire a tennis court, dine at the Island Sporting Club Bistro, shoot hoops on the netball court, play football and cricket or walk the dogs on the sports oval. To top it all off, you can even stay healthy and active in the gym or relax and warm up in the therapeutic sauna at the Phillip Island Leisure Centre located at the rear of the park
With local galleries, conservation and wildlife reserves, renowned fishing hot spots, world-class surf and swimming beaches all amidst the natural beauty of the Victorian countryside, you don't need to wait any longer to be a part of all that Phillip Island has to offer.
Offering
• Located in Cowes, Phillip Island, less than 2 hour's drive from
Melbourne CBD.
• Helipad and airport 15 mins away.
• Near level vacant land of approx. [1029]m2.
• Build your dream home or Multiple units (S.T.C.A).
• Ideal space for your dream family home or weekend escape.
• Close to the beach and Lovers Walk.
• Charming neighbourhood with quality homes and established
gardens.
• Walking distance to the Cowes shops, cafés and restaurants.
• Two minutes from Phillip Island Golf Course and Ten Pin
Bowling & Entertainment Centre.
• A minute or two from the well-equipped Phillip Island Leisure
Centre.
• Close to conservation and wildlife reserves, local galleries
• A short drive to popular wineries, cheese artisans and farm
gates
• Sheltered swimming beaches, renowned fishing hot spots
and world class surfing
photos are not actual views - area views
( advertised open is a guide only Call Agent to meet on site)

Description:
Fabulous Location! Fabulous Style!
This fabulous retro style beach cottage situated in central Cowes and within walking distance to the beach, shops, restaurants, sports grounds and everything else Cowes has to offer, comprises a lovely light filled open plan kitchen, dining and living area with beautiful freshly polished timber floors throughout, three good sized bedrooms, a laundry, separate bathroom and a sunroom which could be used for additional accommodation or as a second living area. There is plenty of lush lawn for the entire family to enjoy, a sunny outdoor deck area and a single lock up garage to complete this delightful property all set on a generous approximately 682 square metre allotment. This spacious home would suit either as a holiday or permanent home; book your inspection today as this gorgeous property won't last long!
This house for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
LUXURIOUS LAKESIDE LIVING
This fantastic 2 storey home is located in the Shearwater estate in East Cowes, opposite the estates picturesque lakes and walking distance to the Phillip Island Golf Club and beautiful Silverleaves beaches. Complete with a swim spa in the back yard, this property would make an ideal permanent or holiday home.
The ground level comprises of a spacious open plan area with tiled floors and wood combustion heater in the living area, a dining area opening onto an entertaining patio, kitchen with large stone benchtop, dishwasher, electric oven, gas cooktop with rangehood, laundry with powder room and external access, a second living/study area and a spacious master bedroom with WIR and ensuite with double vanities, large stepless shower and under floor heating.
The second level comprises of a second living area which features polished timber floors and views across the lake, two bedrooms with BIR’s, bathroom with shower and separate bath as well as a separate powder room. Other features include a fully fenced above ground swim spa with sun deck, double garage with remote door and access through to a single carport, living area wired for surround sound and air conditioning provided by a reverse cycle split system in the downstairs living/ dining area.
The property has a floorplan that will appeal to buyers of all ages in that the master bedroom and kitchen are located on the ground floor, reducing the need to climb stairs.
Call today to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
EXPRESSIONS OF INTEREST closing 1st July 2018
SPACIOUS FAMILY RETREAT FULL OF SURPRISES
This immaculately built home is one of a kind!
Entering through to a beautiful open plan living and dining spread over a flawless one level, this home is perfect as a permanent residence or idyllic holiday home.
Featuring 4 spacious bedrooms, the master with ensuite and WIR. In addition, this unique home boasts a cinema room decked out for those movie nights in with friends and family. Easily converted into a second living room, this space provides opportunity.
Tasmanian oak floors throughout, together with high ceilings, create a beautiful open plan space for all occasions. Custom designed for the ideal entertainment retreat, the additional outdoor kitchen is fitted with stone bench tops, top of the range spit, bbq and bar fridge and a wood fire Coonara to create a cosy retreat in those winter months.
The double garage with external and internal access together with concreted driveways down both sides of the house with access to to the rear gives you plenty or space to store the caravan, boat and dream toys!
To top it off, the backyard has been landscaped for low maintenance living. Additionally, this home is located only a short walk from the local shops, the Cowes foreshore beaches, restaurants and local primary schools.
Call to make a personal inspection and make your coastal dream a reality today!

Description:
Peaceful, Private And Perfectly Positioned
Located in the more tightly held end of Cowes, situated in a private court location and just a short stroll to the beach and town centre is this delightful 3 bedroom home. Only 650m approx to main street and all it has to offer, including shopping, cafes and restaurants and with only 1.5km approx to Cowes pristine north facing beaches. House has been well kept, with not a cent to spend, perfect for use as a permanent residence, holiday home or investment opportunity.
With, spacious and natural light filled rooms and featuring stunning cathedral ceilings this mud brick home offers a large open plan living space, formal and informal dining, central hostess kitchen, 3 large bedrooms, and a modern central family bathroom.
Sit around the cozy wood heater and stay warm all winter, or keep cool with the split system - perfect for the warm summer months. The open plan living has sliding doors both front and back leading out to the north facing alfresco area and also out to the private court yard in the front of the house.
The home has been recently renovated and to create a chic and contemporary space with well established gardens, and ample space for parking boat / caravan and cars with open space at the front of the property and under the raised carport.
The local primary school is situated just a few doors away, yet this property offers complete and total privacy. This is your chance to purchase a property in a great location just move and enjoy all that Phillip Island has to offer
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
IDEAL INVESTMENT OR HOLIDAY HOME
Located in central Cowes, this property would make the ideal investment or holiday home.
The open plan kitchen/living area features a Coonara wood fire and reverse cycle heating and cooling split system.
There are three generous sized bedrooms, two with built in robes and the bathroom has a shower and bath, with a separate toilet.
The land size is 615m2 (approx) with a large garage at the rear of the block plus added space for three cars to be parked at the front of the home.
It is only a short drive from the main street and the north facing beaches of Cowes.
This property is currently tenanted and 24 hours’ notice for inspections is required.
